page.title: 03CLUBS & GROUPS : POYNTINGTON
page.content: In rural areas people often join groups that help to enrich life in their own community.{Church membership here is comparatively high with a strong monthly Young Families Service at Poyntington. On an informal basis newcomers are welcome and supportive visits are made to sick and elderly. {Village hall committees}serve to maintain the hall fabric and encourage local usage,like running Classes,Whist Drives,Jumble Sales,Bring and Buy Fund Raising events or letting for private parties.Poyntington Hall has a pledged fund "Point 50"; Womens Institutes offer friendship and opportunities to acquire new skills,such as we are doing now on this Domesday project. A {local history}was compiled by Members in Corton Denham in 1984.
